channel.title: RS-Reborn - Latest Update: We're doin' it live
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/4839/rsrlogo2.png[/img] [/center]
[hr] Good evening, gentlemen. I'm glad to see that you've taken the time to look at this unbelievably awesome development thread full of pictures and information and shit. Well, as I'm sure you're aware RS-Reborn has been struggling due to development issues as some of our developers have quit. Unfortunately the losses include our web developer, Dawn, our main developer, Paul, and a content developer, Death. Regardless of this we're back once again a two man team of Brent and myself.
Now, to avoid issues regarding Paul's bases' flaws, we've made our own so we're aware of everything that's been added, and how to fix it. We've dropped in the revisions once again to one that we've felt like doing this whole time, which is the 414. We've been working on this for the past month or so, and we have gotten a decent amount of basic features added. We're working on this when we have time, and doing things we feel like doing at the time. There is no set completion date, and we've not even begun to discuss an alpha-testing phase.
[b]Here's some images:[/b]
[img]http://puu.sh/fWsF.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/fWtB.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/7dbfd1212ae9ed5207d00e883cadfc52.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/af0d0d26cfa88d92ea5a402eb9e9fd58.png[/img]

item.title: RS-Reborn - Latest Update: We're doin' it live
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:2574, topic:377067”]Just noticed this thread is still going lol, sorry for the gravedig :>.

Zirconium looks pretty nice though, wouldn’t have called it that. Since a cubic zirconium is often used as a fake diamond.[/quote]
Yeah I wasn’t thinking that when I was asked a quick name xP

Read full topic

item.title: RS-Reborn - Latest Update: We're doin' it live
item.dc:creator: @hybrent hybrent
item.description:
@hybrent wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:2574, topic:377067”]Just noticed this thread is still going lol, sorry for the gravedig :>.

Zirconium looks pretty nice though, wouldn’t have called it that. Since a cubic zirconium is often used as a fake diamond.[/quote]
Lol yeah I don’t think we plan on finalizing our server with that name, but we have nothing better at the moment. Perhaps around alpha time we will worry about a catchy name.

Read full topic

item.description:
@hybrent wrote:

I’m actually still here too lol, we just both moved onto the new project for now. (Go look at Zirconium!)

And yeah it was a scratch based that took some networking concepts from RuneSource and design from Hyperion/custom ideas.

this is so old, the team doesn’t even exist anymore

Scully still comes and goes, as long as he’s there a team could be formed :>

[/quote]
Yeah but my point is that he was an original developer ;). There’s other developers that could be recruited.[/quote]true true

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:2568, topic:377067”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=472982.msg4168072#msg4168072 date=1353928529]
he was a content developer
[/quote]

I couldn’t resist.[/quote]mhm
